Name: Big Bang West
About the game: Tame the American Wild West! Gather essential resources to construct buildings, upgrade your town and prosper as you settle new, uncharted lands. Perfect your town by enhancing infrastructure to attract new citizens and defend them against hordes of bandits in this charming and fast paced strategy game! 'Big Bang West' is a funny strategy game. It offers fast and entertaining game play. You must build towns and cities, defend them against raiders and perform various objectives. Enjoy the American Wild West atmosphere in lovely cartoon graphics! Main features: - Play 35+ original levels - Use different types of buildings and their upgrades to grow your cities - Defend your dwellers against hordes of bandits - Fulfill different types of objectives - Enjoy western original music
Meta Title: Big Bang West: Jun 8, 2021, Pavel Tovarys and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Big Bang West? Check out the release date (Jun 8, 2021), developer insights from Pavel Tovarys, and a complete game summary.
